      • addRoom

        protected void addRoom(int roomNumber,
                       int size)
                throws DuplicateRoomNumberException,
                       WrongRoomSizeException
        Add a valid room to the conference.
        Parameters:
        roomNumber - An int representing the room number.
        size - An int representing the capacity of the room.
        Throws:
        DuplicateRoomNumberException - when room number exists.
        WrongRoomSizeException - when the room size is invalid.

      • addEvent

        protected void addEvent(int roomNo,
                        int eventId,
                        int totalPeople)
                 throws RoomIsFullException
        Add an event to the room.
        Parameters:
        roomNo - Room number of the room that we want to add the event in.
        eventId - Event id of the event we want to add.
        totalPeople - total people of the event.
        Throws:
        RoomIsFullException - when the room is full.

      • remove

        protected void remove(int id)
        Remove an event from the room.
        Parameters:
        id - id of the event we want to remove.

        Returns:

      • findRoom

        public Room findRoom(int roomNumber)
              throws javax.activity.InvalidActivityException
        given a room number, return a room.
        Parameters:
        roomNumber: - The room number of the Room you are looking for.
        Returns:
        Returns a room with the room number if the room exists.
        Throws:
        javax.activity.InvalidActivityException - When the room number does not exist.

      • getSchedule

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> getSchedule(int roomNumber)
                                                   throws javax.activity.InvalidActivityException
        Get the events planned in a room.
        Parameters:
        roomNumber - The room number of the room that we are looking for.
        Returns:
        The list of event in id's of the given room.
        Throws:
